name: The Obelisk (wilsk)
description:
Three explorers travel through the jungle and find a mysterious stone obelisk. Suddenly the jungle comes alive, and creature pour out to attack the explorers. They are quickly overcome, but the obelisk is not done with them. It strengthens them and stands them once more in front of the horde.

How to play

You control three characters fighting a horde of jungle creatures. Use the arrow buttons on the right to move the characters between one of three lanes. Characters will auto attack. Purchase upgraded abilities and use them with Q, W, E, R, D and F. Try to outlast all the waves, or give up - I have no idea if its beatable 

Notes

See the LD page for https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/the-obelisk known issues.

Binaries have recently been re-uploaded to fix a crash on loading.
